_header: To his disciples said Jesus / As Saint Matthew here tells us
_description: Gospel, ‘Dominica iiij. post Octave Epiphanie’, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
TO his diciples seide IhesusAs seint Matheu telleþ
                    vs…
BodEngPoeta1.Note:
This MS separates 5982 and 528 two lines later, ending 5982 with the first
                    two lines of 528.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Simile est regnum celorum homini igitur seminauit (f.
                        177rb)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Till his dissiples saide ihesusAls saynte mathewe here tellis
                    vs…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…& couetyce and liccheryeAnd glotonye and
                    triccherie
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Tyll his dysciples said ihesusAls saint matheu her telles
                    vs…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Glotony slewth and lycheryAnd couatyse and
                    trechery

EDCPCM.First Lines:
til his decipeles said iesusAls sain matheu her tellis
                    us…
EDCPCM.Last Lines:
…And couaitys and tricherieAnd glotonnye and
                    licherye
EDCPCM.Attributed Title:
Dominica iiii post octavam epiphanie Secundum matheum (f.
                    33va)

Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Tyll hys discipyles sayd ihesusals saynt mathew telles
                    vs…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…With couatyse and trecheryAnd luste with [illegible]
                    lychery
MinULZ822.Attributed Title:
Dominica iiiia post octavas Epiphanie Secundum Matheum (f.
                    17)

                    vs…
